channel.title: Pfaffikus
channel.description: On this channel changes on the Internet-Site www.pfaffikus.de will be announced, but the channel will also be utilized for announcing updates with respect to the maintained R packages and complimentary material to the published books.

item.title: R in Finance 2013: Presentation
item.description: The presentation of this year's R in Finance conference has been made available for download.

item.title: FRAPO released on R-Forge
item.description: The R package 'FRAPO' accompanying the book 'Financial Risk Modelling and Portfolio Optimization with R' has been uploaded to R-Forge. The book will become available before Christmas in Europe and by end-of-January in the US.

item.title: Latest R-Forge version of packages on CRAN and Pfaffikus
item.description: The latest development versions of the packages evir, gogarch, QRM, rneos, urca and vars have been contributed from R-Forge to CRAN. These versions are also made available on the Pfaffikus-Site (source and Windows-binary).

item.title: Authors@R directive now in evir, QRM, rneos, urca and vars on R-Forge
item.description: In the development versions of the above packages, Authors@R fields have been included in their respective DESCRIPTION files. In the case of the packages evir, QRM, urca and vars, the packages' heritages and/or the contributors are now accounted for by means of the person() function.

item.title: Package gogarch (R-Forge) with Authors@R
item.description: Reminded by the recent R Journal article [http://journal.r-project.org/archive/2012-1/RJournal_2012-1_Hornik~et~al.pdf], in the DESCRIPTION file of the gogarch package an Authors@R tag is now used.
